name: forgecomply360
description: ForgeComply 360 - Enterprise GRC Platform by Forge Cyber Defense (SDVOSB)

scripts.test:all: npm test && cd frontend && npm test
scripts.frontend:build:demo: cd frontend && cp .env.demo .env.production.local && npm run build && rm .env.production.local
scripts.frontend:deploy:demo: cd frontend && cp .env.demo .env.production.local && npm run build && rm .env.production.local && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=forgecomply360 --branch=demo
scripts.frontend:deploy:staging: cd frontend && npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=forgecomply360 --branch=staging
scripts.frontend:deploy:production: cd frontend && npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=forgecomply360 --branch=main
